name: SPHERE.IO Fedora
description: Create your own webshop in minutes with SPHERE.IO and our template 'sphere-fedora'

SPHERE_PROJECT_KEY.description: The project Key for your SPHERE.IO project.

SPHERE_CLIENT_ID.description: The clientId of your SPHERE.IO project.

SPHERE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The clientSecret of your SPHERE.IO project.

PAYMILL_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The privateKey of your PayMill account.

PAYMILL_PUBLIC_KEY.description: The publicKey of your PayMill account.

PROJECT_LANGS.description: The languages you want to support in your frontend.

PROJECT_DEFAULT_LOCALE.description: The language which is by default selected in your frontend.

PROJECT_COUNTRIES.description: The countries you want to support in your frontend.

PROJECT_CURRENCIES.description: The currencies you want to support in your frontend.

PROJECT_CURRENCY_DEFAULT.description: The currency which is by default selected in your frontend.

PROJECT_SELECTABLE_ATTRIBUTES.description: The attributes you want to use to distinguish variants.
